allowTags( string $key, string $value, string $allowedTags ) : boolean

Strip all tags in the field. The parameter can be a string of allowed tags.

Arguments
$key
string
The name of the field
$value
string
The value of the field
$allowedTags
string
A comma-separated list of tags to allow in the field&#039;s value. Leave blank to allow all.
Output
boolean

validate
jump to class

validate( string $key, mixed $value, string $type ) : boolean

Validates a field based on a custom rule, if specified

Arguments
$key
string
The key of the field
$value
mixed
The value of the field
$type
string
Optional. The type of the validator to apply. Can either be a method name of fiValidator or a Snippet name.
Output
boolean
True if validation was successful. If not, will store error messages to $this->errors.
Details
visibility
public
final
false
static
false
access
public

validateFields
jump to class

validateFields( array $keys = array, string $validationFields ) : array

Validates an array of fields. Returns the field names and values, with the field names stripped of their validators.

The key names can be in this format:

name:validator=param:anotherValidator:oneMoreValidator=param

Arguments
$keys
array
The fields to validate.
$validationFields
string
Output
array
An array of field name => value pairs.
Details
visibility
public
final
false
static
false
access
public
